name: PlanetControl.io
description:
Goal:

Destroy all the tiles of other player(s) to take control of the planet

How to play:

Simple, Everything is done by just clicking on the tiles.

Colonize the empty tiles to earn food, intel and metal.

You need 10 foods to colonize a tile, 10 intel to reveal a hidden tile and 10 metals to add a unit to any tile (add units to your tiles to defend and enemy tiles to attack).

Tips:

1 - The more units you have on an enemy tile, the faster they lose control of that tile

2 - You lose all units on an enemy tile after you take control of it. Be smart when spending your precious units.

Enjoy! and let me know if you have any suggestions.
